features: [ Over 20000+ Built-in Retro Games ] - Enjoy a vast collection of games with no need to download or install anything, as long as connected to the TV or monitor can play directly , With 9 big simulators,you'll never run out of options

[ Two competitive gamepads ] - Play with friends and family with Premium Competitive level Dual Controllers adapters that are responsive and easy to operate, providing a more enjoyable and fun gaming experience, best competitive gamepads, best new experience

[ Easy Plug and Play Game console ] - Simply connect the controller to the power supply, plug it into the TV, and turn the power on the TV to the HD channel, The game list screen will display on the TV, and you're ready to play. (2 controllers require 4 AAA batteries, not included in the package)

[ Immersive 4K Gaming Experience ] - Enjoy high-definition picture quality with 4K HDMI output and 1080P resolution, equipped with extended HDMI cable, suitable for different monitors [Only need to have HDMI interface], can be connected to TV/computer/TV set-top box /PC, perfect to meet your high resolution and game configuration needs, and the retro stick supports saving game progress, making it perfect for saving game progress at anytime.

[ Perfect Holiday Gift ] - Ideal for birthdays, Thanksgiving, Christmas, and parties, this classic version of the console is perfect for children and adults alike. With a vast collection of games, it's sure to bring joy and enhance communication and feelings with loved ones.
body.description: 20000+ Games, Retro Game Console, Nostalgia Stick Game, Revisit Classic Games, Retro Play Plug and Play Video Game Stick 2023 newest Retro Game Console, Handheld ConsoleBuilt-in Two competitive gamepads, Over 20000+ GamesContains a lot of games, Over 20000+ Built-in Retro GamesOur 2023 newest gamepads Console Retro Game Console Over 20000+ Built-in Retro Games, support 4K HDMI Output, 9 emulators, Built-in Premium Competitive level Dual ControllersSport type handle, Two competitive level gamepadsThe console's controller is the right size, curves perfectly and fits well into the palm, making it easier to unlock more functions while playing games, you won't feel the tiredness of your palms after you play for a long time.Will bring you happy playtime, allowing you to easily enjoy happy, relaxed,and fulfilling leisure time with friends and family !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this thinking I would be able to play Nintendo games but it don’t have it .. as far as the other games I guess where ok the function on the buttons where not as good as a top remote but I quess it works

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: All the old school games you could ever want. We have been having a blast with this. Too many games to even list. Best bang for the buck !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Controllers Take a While to Connect.
reviews.reviewText: When I first put this on my TV I thought I had defective controllers. They wouldn't do anything so I chatted with an Amazon Associate online to attempt to troubleshoot the issue. After having the game on for about 5 to 10 minutes the first controller turned on, a few minutes later the second one turned on. There are plenty of games on here and I'm hoping my sons will enjoy it for Christmas. So be ready for the controllers to take awhile to sync with the game. AAA batteries are needed for them. The directions leave much to be desired, the translation from Chinese to English is a little off. For the price o don't think it was a bad purchase.Just an important update, in order to turn the controllers on all you need to do is hold down the home button on the middle of the controller. I figured this out through trying to turn them on. The instructions don't tell you this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Even the device is good, The sound is not possible to control it. I mute the TV and even like that the device sounds to loud.
